entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-d'Espoir 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling

Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: S 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
